name: typescript-compiler-in-the-browser
description: attempt to see if and how much we can run typescript compiler in the browser

scripts.bundle-src: npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && browserify dist/src/compiler/main.js --debug -x typescript -t brfs -o static/src.js -i fs.realpath -i fs-extra -i dir-glob -i graceful-fs -i fast-glob -i fs -i source-map-support -i globby -i glob-parent -i glob
scripts.watchify: watchify dist/src/compiler/main.js --debug -x typescript -t brfs -o static/src.js -i fs.realpath -i fs-extra -i dir-glob -i graceful-fs -i fast-glob -i fs -i source-map-support -i globby -i glob-parent -i glob
scripts.dev-prepare: rm -rf static dist ; npm run tsc ; npm run copy-projects-json; npm run cp-static ; npm run bundle-typescript && npm run bundle-src
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watchify" "npm run tsc-watch" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run watch-static"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist static docs; npm run tsc && npm run copy-projects-json && npm run cp-static && npm run bundle-src && npm run bundle-typescript
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run minify-src && npm run minify-typescript && mkdir -p ../docs && rm -rf ../docs/typescript-compiler && mv static ../docs/typescript-compiler
scripts.all-no-minify: npm run build && mkdir -p ../docs && rm -rf ../docs/typescript-compiler  && mv static ../docs/typescript-compiler

author: Sebastian Gurin
